abstract: Berkshire Hathaway, the company led by Warren E. Buffett, said it had modestly raised its stakes in Wells Fargo and U.S. Bancorp, two banks whose market values have fallen significantly.
snippet: Berkshire Hathaway, the company led by Warren E. Buffett, said it had modestly raised its stakes in Wells Fargo and U.S. Bancorp, two banks whose market values have fallen significantly.
lead_paragraph: Berkshire Hathaway, the company led by Warren E. Buffett, said it had modestly raised its stakes in Wells Fargo and U.S. Bancorp, two banks whose market values have fallen significantly.

headline.main: Buffett’s Berkshire Raises Stake in Two Banks
